issue.title: [CF 1406] How to Track Group of Players afflicted with Buf/Debuff
issue.body:
Hi,

 

I was wondering if there was a way to use a Icon to Track all players wit a buff/debuff. No matter how much I try, I only get the last afflicted playerm, or the total afflicted players with named buff/debuff


> Posted by CurseForge user krisam2408 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1406 | Raw

comments.body:
Create a group and put your icon that tracks the buff/debuff as the first icon in that group. Check the "Group Controller" setting. You'll get an icon for each player with the buff/debuff.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
